name: Winter Tattoo Design Artist
description:
Come and get your tattoo fever on with the winter tattoo artist in his tattoo designs studio. Draw beautifully and stunning tattoo art on different body parts of your fashion clients who come from varieties of art fans and want tattoo style like in the best tattoo games.

OXO Games Studio brings a season special game with this winter tattoo design studio for tattoo games and art fans. Use special real tools to draw art on multiple body parts and many unique style art and feel like a real tattoo artist with a top ranking tattoo maker game.

FEATURES:
• Multiple tattoo drawing levels
• Perform cleaning on body parts before drawing art
• Multiple beautiful tattoo styles to draw
• An amazing tattoo maker studio
• Realistic HD Graphics
• Easy to play
• Free to play forever
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
